commit.message:
Cargo update

Remove `rustc-ap-rustc_errors` from dependencies since it
is re-exported from `rustc-ap-syntax`.

files.patch:
@@ -54,8 +54,8 @@ source = "registry+https://github.com/rust-lang/crates.io-index"
